title: Web 2.0-Based Higher Education Online Science Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and foundational understanding of digital tool usage
context.additional_context: Accommodating working learners' flexible scheduling needs, requiring BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) integration and collaborative tools

learning_goals: Learners can create digital content on scientific topics using Web 2.0 tools (blogs, wikis, collaborative platforms)
Learners can collaborate with peers via online discussion and feedback systems to propose solutions for scientific problems
Learners can establish self-directed learning plans and manage their learning progress in digital environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
